transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello ji.
Executive: Hi sir very good morning kaise hain aap?
Customer: Main theek hoon aap bataye.
Executive: Main bhi bas badhiya sir thank you so much for asking. Actually actually IndiaMART se baat kar rahi thi main Govind ki manager.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Hai na actually aapka ek catalog hai yahan pe aur aap first feature and page act kar rahe hain mujhe.
Customer: Ji haan.
Executive: Right uske regards aapka request tha aapke catalog se related right so main just apne side se maine ek chota sa feedback call kiya hai sir matlab jaisa ki aapko aapse bataya ja raha tha kafi aapko miscommitment vagera kiya gaya services ko lekar.
Customer: Ji ji mam.
Executive: To abhi abhi aap is vajah se hi services ko use nahi kar rahe hain aap right?
Customer: Ji mam.
Executive: Theek hai to mujhe ek bar batayenge sir ki matlab aisa kya miscommitment kiya gaya tha aapko services se related.
Customer: Aapne I think Govind mujhe bata raha tha.
Executive: Ji ji bataye.
Customer: Main selling motivated tha IndiaMART se aap plan lene ke liye but mujhse contact kiya gaya kai logon ne kiya yahan pe ek wale aapke aaye the shayad but maine baat ki call aaya to maine liya unhone sari cheeze explain ki maine kaha theek hai actually main IndiaMART se pehle bhi user raha hoon.
Executive: But selling ke taur pe maine abhi start kiya hai.
Customer: Ji ji mujhe bhi yahi cheez maloom hui thi ki aapne pehle bhi ek form ek form chalaya hai IndiaMART pe.
Customer: Main ek aur call aaya tha IndiaMART karke.
Executive: Ek second rukiyega Govind call kar rahe ho kya sabko wale sabko call kar rahe ho.
Executive: Nahi nahi abhi to matlab meri team se to abhi aapko call nahi ja raha hai.
Customer: Okay main bhi mam ki sure team se raha hoon.
Executive: Koi nahi koi nahi actually kya hai ki I think aapne yahan se shayad refund ke liye process kiya hua hai matlab refund ke liye aapne process karne ke liye bola hua hai Govind ko right?
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Hai na to vahi process start hai to shayad isliye aapko team se call aa raha hoga koi problem nahi hai aap discuss kar lijiyega but main is bar janna chah rahi thi aapse ki ha is matlab aisa kya aapse miscommitment kiya miscommitment kiya gaya uski main services aapka dekh rahi thi ki jyada time to hua nahi hai hamari services ko.
Customer: Ji mam actually hua kya ki sir uske baad mujhe sari cheeze explain ki gayi maine purchase ki.
Executive: Haan haan.
Customer: First of all unhone mujhe jo demo diya tha usme bataya tha ki sir aisa aisa aapka products rahenge aapka business grow karega aur aapka karobari matlab next to next aap one month ke andar aap nikal lenge aapke pass kitne leads aayenge aur itna aap extra lead milegi aap lead consume kijiye fir aapka day bhi pehli baat to unhone bataya ki aap jaise lead aapka jaise wo hoga grow karega wo fund pe count hoga ye sari cheeze bataya aur main unhone kaha unlimited calls aayengi aapka matlab basically aaj tak mujhe ek call nahi aayi hai not a single call.
Executive: Right.
Customer: Pehle jo unhone di hai wo bol rahe the wo samjhiye mere ek bhi kaam ki nahi hai starting me maine consume bhi kiye kuch.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Mostly to jo bhi hai main unhone pehle hi apna criteria bataya tha mujhe Gorakhpur aur isse deal karna hai abhi itna mera pan India ka project nahi hai fir suppose agar man lijiye koi 7000 ka saman kharid raha hai to 10000 transportation me nahi dega basic si baat hai.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: To mujhe jo client chahiye lokali bechne ke liye to aaj tak ye sari cheeze ek bhi cheez nahi hai unhone kaha ki at least business milega mujhe kya business to kya hi mila headache extra badh gaya ki open kijiye open kijiye baith jaiye fir zoom kijiye logon ko aur first of all interested nahi hai log jo customers hai yahi sari cheeze nahi aur main cheez unhone kaha ki daily call aayegi maine dusre bhi cross platform pe bhi isse pehle kiya tha jaise sale vagera jaise to usme at least call to aati thi customer visit to karte the mera business jo bhi hai xyz nahi pasand aaya unki problem hai meri problem hai jo bhi hai.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: But at least inquiries to aani chahiye kuch nahi aaya.
Executive: Theek hai matlab aapka point vahi hai dekho thoda sa unhone aapko log aapko thoda sa jyada aapki expectation kar di hai unhone but aisa bilkul bhi nahi hota thoda matlab aap bhi is cheez ko samjhoge ki ek mahine me sir kahin bhi agar aap offline bhi kahin apna shop khol rahe ho na to ek mahine me possible hi nahi hai ki aapko business aayega kyuki aap kuch samjhiye ki ek mahine to sir aapko uske according visibility banane me lag jayegi aapke khud ke area me bhi ab main Gorakhpur me bhi dekh rahi hoon jaise Gorakhpur steel work main vaise Gorakhpur ke hi side ki hoon sir Baliya location aap jante honge.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Mera hometown vahi pe hai to main to vahi cheez hai ki main already janti hoon Gorakhpur bhi so abhi kya hai ki main Gorakhpur me bhi abhi kuch log dekh rahi hoon jaise Gorakhpur steel works ho gaya ek company hai Kaka enterprises karke company hai Gorakhpur me hi Akash aluminium and steel work karke company hai Gorakhpur me hi MS Shaman trading company karke ek hai Maa Durga innovation hai to there are lot of companies in Gorakhpur location and they are using IndiaMART higher services aisa nahi hai sir ki wo basically use kar rahe hain isme se kuch kuch company aisi hai jo aapke higher services bhi use kar rahi hain IndiaMART ke level par to main aapko ye bilkul bhi nahi kahungi ki aapko ek mahine me business aapko yahan se IndiaMART pe mil jayega kyuki main bhi agar apna kahin pe shop kholti main ab jaise main agar Baliya se uth ke main agar Noida shift hui hoon right to mere ko ek ek mahine che mahine mujhe lag gaye honge Noida ko jane me ki kaun si cheez kahan pe hai right agar mere ko.
Customer: Spending mam lag gaye honge lekin ye cheeze aise commit nahi karni chahiye na ki suppose aapko.
Executive: Haan bilkul aapki baat sahi hai main vahi cheez bol rahi hoon ki wo vahan pe thoda sa aapka galat expectation setting ho gaya hai lekin ye cheez agar main hoon agar aap main agar unki jagah pe main hoon to main aapko simply yahi samjhaungi sir jo dedh se do mahine to aapko aapki listing banane me lag jayegi uske baad kahin na kahin aapko business milna start hoga aur usme bhi properly aapko apne catalog pe work karna padega ki aap apne by lead par proper active ho kyuki dekhiye by lead ka bhi kya hai na sir ki agar IndiaMART aapko ek week me 70 leads de raha hai ek mahine me agar aapko 68 leads de raha hai to 68 leads se aapko conversion nahi honge kahin na kahin aap fir aap ja ke wo 68 by lead me se agar aap 50 55 by lead consume kar rahe ho to usme se aapko do char buyer aapke kaam ke nikalenge ye ye normal hai sir aap agar offline bhi kaam kar rahe ho aap agar online bhi kaam kar rahe ho to dono jagahon pe same hai offline bhi agar aapke pass din me 10 buyer aate honge to 10 ke 10 aap se deal karke nahi jate honge right do log price puch ke chale jate honge hai na product dekh ke chale jate ho baad me bataunga abhi thodi der me update karta hoon agli bar aake le jaunga to ye cheeze hoti hai right to main aapko simply aapko yahi kahungi ki sir aapko na yahan pe properly na ek rakhna chahiye tha ki aap apna proper by lead pe kaam karo inquiry pe kaam karo ab jaise main October ki hi baat karu theek hai abhi to chalo aapne refund ke liye bol diya hai ki aapko apna paisa refund hi chahiye right ab agar main October ki baat karu to October me aapke pass 68 by leads aayi hongi total.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Theek hai 68 by lead me se humne jo by lead consume ki hai IndiaMART par wo humne sirf 11 by lead consume ki hai.
Customer: By lead ki kabhi jarurat nahi hoti.
Executive: Pure mahine me.
Customer: Hold on haan sorry.
Executive: Theek hai.
Executive: Haan to main vahi bol rahi hoon ki matlab 68 by lead hame mil raha hai pure mahine me IndiaMART ki taraf se aur humne sirf 11 by lead consume ki hai IndiaMART se aur agar main baat karu aapke product lines me ki by lead kitni approve ho rahi hai to aapki jaise aluminium sliding window hai hai na usme 15000 by lead approve ho rahi hai IndiaMART ke level par stainless steel glass railing me 5000 by lead approve ho rahi hai pure saal me agar main sirf November November ki baat karu to 72 by lead hai aluminium sliding me aur stainless steel glass railing me 211 by lead approve hongi right to aisa nahi hai ki by lead nahi hai hamare level pe lekin vahi hai ki thoda sa aapka jo one month me hi aapka conversion aa jayega ye vali cheeze thodi si wrong commitment ho gayi hai aapke sath theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai mam baki to koi issue nahi hai.
Executive: That sari cheeze aise commit karta ki main isko procrastinate karta ki haan theek hai jab mere pass time hoga ya mere pass manpower hogi is cheez ke koi itna time de pa raha hai tab main isko purchase karta.
Customer: Haan bilkul bilkul aapki baat sahi hai.
Executive: Theek hai by lead ka concept mujhe kabhi samjhaya nahi gaya unhone bataya ki theek hai aapke pass lead aayi by lead ka concept unhone nahi kiya ki aapko aise baat karni padegi grooming karni padegi may be ho na ho kya ho concept pehle maine socha genuine customers honge aayenge and dekhenge products kya jo bhi hoga discuss karenge.
Executive: Haan vahi cheez hai sir ki matlab ab dekhiye jaise main aapko sari cheeze clear cut bata rahi hoon right ki sir ye hoga aapka right to aapke mindset aapke mind me ye cheez clear ho raha hai ki haan agar main 68 by lead le raha hoon to usme se mere ko sare convert nahi honge panch se cheh aise buyer milenge jo mere kaam ke honge hai na usme se bhi ho sakta hai ki koi follow up ban jayega ki aage karunga koi aisa hoga ki theek hai aaj hi deal kar lega right to agar aapko mahine me 68 me se agar aapko do conversion bhi mil rahe hain to enough hai jo aapne 28000 32000 aapne IndiaMART ko jo invest kiya hai 32000 wo agar aap mahine me do deal bhi agar aapko mil rahi hai to saal ke according aapko 24 deal milegi aur us 24 deal se aapko easily nikal jayega aur ye main sirf by lead ki baat kar rahi hoon iske alava dekho inquiries aur call bhi jo aap matlab aap jo dhoondh rahe ho na sir ki inquiry nahi aa rahi hai calls mere pass nahi aa rahi hai wo sara hi na aapka match hai aapka sara hi wo fix hai by lead consumption se aap by lead consume karoge aapka activation dikhega market me jaise jaise by lead consume karoge aapka activation dikhta hai ki haan aapne itne by lead consume kiye fir us according aapki market visibility badhti hai to aapke number of calls aur number of inquiries aapki badhti hai kyuki jab market me aap dikhna start hote hain na aapki visibility market me dikhti hai to vahan pe fir vahan se buyer aapko approach karna start kar dete hain ab jab aap by lead consume hi nahi karenge to vahan pe aapka visibility nahi badhega aapka down hi hota jayega kyuki aapko bataya gaya hoga ya fir aapne pehle bhi use kiya hai to aapko pata hoga ki AI based pe IndiaMART kaam karta hai sir right aap jaisa by lead consume karenge.
Customer: Bilkul bilkul mujhe ye cheez mujhe bhi samjh aa rahi hai.
Customer: Nahi mam mujhe to at least na itna definitely mujhe nahi idea tha maine jaise products procure kiye the purchase kiye the to basically usme sir cheeze aise bas call aati thi aap apni requirements bataye fir uske baad aage se call aata tha bas isi base pe hota tha.
Executive: Haan haan.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Okay to yahi hai sir ki IndiaMART actually kya hai ki AI based pe work karta hai matlab aap jis tarike ka by lead consume karenge jis location ka consume karenge aapka usi tarike ka preferred location aur category banta hai sab uske according by lead aati hai right to same aise hi market me hai sir ki aap market me agar aap dekhenge aapka jo product line hai us product line me already 1000 se plus products available hai aur multiple supplier IndiaMART ke level par deal kar rahe hain to aap khud samjhiye ki IndiaMART sabko to topper nahi dikha sakta hai na sir right to wo same na wo is tarike se karta hai ki man ke chaliye aap basic services use kar rahe hain to ab basic me jitne bhi supplier honge IndiaMART ke level par jo kaam kar rahe honge IndiaMART me ab un basics me na activation ke upar rotation hota hai sir aaj aap apne catalog me sabse highly active hoke use kar rahe hain to aapki visibility Gorakhpur me topper dikhegi right kal ko aapne agar visibility down kar di ek hafte aapne kuch use hi nahi kiya hai to fir vahan pe aap se jo acha khasa use kar raha hoga uska visibility topper dikhna start ho jayega to activation rotation karta hai IndiaMART.
Customer: Nahi mam mujhe itni clarity nahi hui thi na ye demonstration hua tha is type ka ye sari cheeze batai nahi gayi thi ki main bhi aapki baat samajh raha hoon ki haan it is worth time aur aapko time dena padega.
Executive: Haan vahi cheez main aapko other way me cheeze explain kar rahi hoon ki haan sir aap agar IndiaMART pe aaye hain to thoda time taking hoga but aisa nahi hoga ki aapko IndiaMART se business nahi milega right to vahi cheez hai ki wo cheez aapko starting me clear karna chahiye taki aapka us according mindset rahe right ki haan mujhe IndiaMART pe jate hi business nahi mil jayega.
Customer: Bilkul.
Executive: Theek hai anyways koi problem nahi hai sir aap mera number save kar sakte hain agar aapka same number whatsapp pe hai to main aapko.
Customer: Ha mam same number hai ji.
Executive: Aapko hua hai right to wo to already process start ho chuka hai hamare side to wo aapko fir us according jaise hi matlab process complete hoga wo aapko according rahega.
Customer: Thoda mam aapki baat kat rahi thi ek bar please repeat kijiye.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan ji sir kya keh rahe hain aap?
Customer: Haan mam aapki actually aawaz kat rahi thi fir se repeat kijiye.
Executive: Main keh rahi hoon haan main ye keh rahi hoon ki matlab abhi aapka aisa aisa to nahi hai na ki hum wapas se ek bar chala ke dekhe services and all aisa kuch to aapka.
Customer: Nahi nahi to be honest mera experience ya bahut acha nahi raha hai theek hai mujhe agar lena bhi hai to main sabse badi baat aap logon ke through lunga at least jo genuine ho pehle se bataye theek hai mere pass hoga mere mindset me rahega to main vaise hi act karunga ab unhone commit kuch aur kiya hai abhi de mujhe kuch aur rahe hain.
Executive: Haan.
Executive: Haan.
Executive: Haan.
Executive: Bilkul vahi.
Executive: Haan.
Executive: Theek hai sir koi baat nahi dekhiye meri side se na mera ye tha ki main aapko ek bar na cheeze na clear kar du ki sir dekhiye aisa aisa scene hai aapka agar mindset ho raha hoga ki chalo theek hai aisa hai to main ek bar chala ke dekhta hoon ek saal to wo ek different thing hai right wo aapke mindset ke upar depend karta hai but main force nahi karungi ki sir aap chalaiye isko theek hai kyuki fir aap aage ja ke agar fir mere ko bolne lage ek ek mahine baad ki mam ab mujhe band karna hai to vahan pe fir hamare liye mushkil hoga aapka refund karana right to isliye maine aapko clear kiya mujhe nahi hai aisa koi bhi plan ji chalane ka.
Customer: Achcha.
Executive: Theek hai koi issue nahi hai sir main aapko ek bar whatsapp pe hi ping kar de rahi hoon theek hai aap Govind ko bhi connect kar sakte ho baki aap mere ko bhi connect kar sakte ho agar aapko koi bhi issue hota hai to theek hai we will try hum aapka ye process karwa denge theek hai.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Okay thank you so much.
Customer: Okay thank you so much sir thank you so much.
summary:
Concerns:

- Miscommitment regarding services.

- No business or calls received.

- By leads are not relevant.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the process of IndiaMART.

- Executive explained the importance of by leads.

- Executive shared her WhatsApp number.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will ping the customer on WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, buyleads, subscription, services
